name: Michael Daniel V. Samson
text: Apparently, the science is pretty authentic:  http://www.wired.com/2014/10/astrophysics-interstellar-black-hole/.   Christine  and I liked it, and it definitely isn't for everyone.  Will need to brush up on my Grand Unification Theory.  TARS is the best.  Been liking AIs in SciFi since GERTY in Moon.
